title: 6.1 Master Challenge 3
question:
The pictograph below shows how different students feel on each day of the week.

1. On which day of the week do most students feel playful?
2. On which day of the week do most students feel upset?
3. Fred says students are more playful on Friday. Tina says students are more playful on Sunday. Who is correct?
4. How do you think the students would feel on Monday if it is a holiday?

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
